## di-account-management-backend

These lambdas make up the core of the backend and data store that serves the account management application. 


[GitHub Repository](https://github.com/govuk-one-login/di-account-management-backend/tree/main/lambda)

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## di-account-management-frontend

Also known as the Account Management Frontend (AMF).


[GitHub Repository](https://github.com/govuk-one-login/di-account-management-frontend)

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown: ## Number of messages on each Queue

thresholds.columnId: LambdaFunction rate of failed invocations to all invocations %
LambdaFunction number of times a function is invoked

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
# [KMS](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/kms.html#limits_kms)

Default quotas:
- Cryptographic operations (symmetric) request rate [**CryptographicOperationsSymmetric**]: 10,000 per second
- Cryptographic operations (RSA) request rate [**CryptographicOperationsRsa**]: 500 per second
- Cryptographic operations (ECC) request rate [**CryptographicOperationsEcc**]: 300 per second

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
# [Secrets Manager](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/asm.html#limits_secrets-manager)

Default quotas:
- Combined rate of DescribeSecret and GetSecretValue API requests [**DesribeSecret, GetSecretValue**]: 10,000 per second
- Rate of ListSecrets API requests [**ListSecrets**]: 100 per second
